title: Update changelog: INumberPadTimePicker.View APIs are no longer public
message: Update changelog: INumberPadTimePicker.View APIs are no longer public

title: Hide NumberPadTimePicker's implementations of INumberPadTimePicker.View APIs.
message:
Hide NumberPadTimePicker's implementations of INumberPadTimePicker.View APIs.

These APIs have been moved to the package-private NumberPadTimePickerComponent class.

title: Create CHANGELOG.md beginning in version 1.1.0
message: Create CHANGELOG.md beginning in version 1.1.0

title: Make tablet optimizations to sample app to demo NumberPadTimePicker views.
message:
Make tablet optimizations to sample app to demo NumberPadTimePicker views.

Changes:
- Use ExactHeight styles for sw600dp-port qualifier.
- Set ScrollView as root of TimePickerActivity only when smallest screen width is less than 600dp.

title: Changes to README:
message:
Changes to README:

- Minor syntax and typo fixes
- Update section about dialog and Activity theming to list NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerStandaloneStyle instead of NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerStyle for consistency with the other base styles

title: Changes:
message:
Changes:
- Create NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerStandaloneStyle style resource. This is for consistency with the NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerAlertStyle and NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerBottomSheetStyle style resources.
- Update the comments for the deprecated NPTP_NumberPadTimePickerStyle and NPTP_NumberPadTimePickerBottomSheetStyle style resources to instead recommend the NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerAlertStyle and NPTP_Base_NumberPadTimePickerBottomSheetStyle style resources, respectively. These deprecated style resources were used in version 1.0.0 to style the NumberPadTimePicker in the dialogs; as such, the earlier recommendations to use the FillHeight and ExactHeight style variants were redundant and would have caused confusion, because the dialogs internally set the NumberPadTimePicker's layout_width and layout_height to WRAP_CONTENT.

title: Use base styles for dialog layouts instead of ExactHeight or FillHeight style variants.
message:
Use base styles for dialog layouts instead of ExactHeight or FillHeight style variants.

Specifying layout_width and layout_height on the NumberPadTimePicker is redundant when it is placed in a dialog, because they will always be internally set to WRAP_CONTENT.

title: Add caveat to README about using NumberPadTimePicker in limited-height screen sizes
message: Add caveat to README about using NumberPadTimePicker in limited-height screen sizes

title: Update README to document use of new styles
message: Update README to document use of new styles

title: Set ExactHeight styles in library's dialog layouts and in sample's custom dialog themes
message: Set ExactHeight styles in library's dialog layouts and in sample's custom dialog themes

title: Fix crashing on earlier versions of the platform when calling super.onRestoreInstanceState().
message:
Fix crashing on earlier versions of the platform when calling super.onRestoreInstanceState().

It is necessary to pass the super state of the provided state instead of the provided state itself.

title: Change default ExactHeight bottom sheet style to use layout_width of…
message:
Change default ExactHeight bottom sheet style to use layout_width of match_parent instead of wrap_content.

This commit fixes the vertical bounds of the number pad grid in 24-hour mode. Prior to this fix, the 24-hour view rendered at a larger height than the 12-hour view did, causing the number pad grid to be drawn without vertical bounds for SDK 23+.

title: Use dimen resource instead of explicit dimension for fixed-width styles
message: Use dimen resource instead of explicit dimension for fixed-width styles

title: Move custom width styles from sample to library.
message:
Move custom width styles from sample to library.

Clients can now get fixed-width NumberPadTimePickers when they apply the existing style resources: NPTP_NumberPadTimePickerStyle and NPTP_NumberPadTimePickerBottomSheetStyle.

title: Update build.gradle: SDK 26, build tools 26.0.1, support library 26.0.0. Bump…

title: Update README for version 1.1.0
message: Update README for version 1.1.0

title: Fix dialogs not being dismissed after clicking OK button when the requested time…
message:
Fix dialogs not being dismissed after clicking OK button when the requested time mode is different than the one NumberPadTimePicker is initialized with.

This bug occurred when the picker's time mode is changed via setIs24HourMode(). The picker creates a new Presenter instance, but the Presenter reference in DialogPresenter was not updated with this new instance.

This commit adds the OnTimeModeChange callback interface to NumberPadTimePicker, through which the new Presenter instance is passed back to callers of setIs24HourMode().

title: Move all tests from NumberPadTimePickerDialogPresenterTest to…
message:
Move all tests from NumberPadTimePickerDialogPresenterTest to NumberPadTimePickerPresenterTest and delete the class.

The View/Presenter interfaces now handle those DialogView/DialogPresenter responsibilities that were under test in NumberPadTimePickerDialogPresenterTest. This obviates the NumberPadTimePickerDialogPresenterTest class.

title: Rename INumberPadTimePicker.Presenter methods: onCreate() to presentState() and…
message: Rename INumberPadTimePicker.Presenter methods: onCreate() to presentState() and onStop() to detachView().

title: Convert NumberPadTimePickerDialogViewDelegate to a non-instantiable class with…
message: Convert NumberPadTimePickerDialogViewDelegate to a non-instantiable class with static setup methods, and rename it to DialogViewInitializer.

A View must have an ID in order for the platform to call its onSaveInstanceState() method.

title: Use row weight of 1 for all buttons in the number pad grid for each NumberPadTimePicker layout.
message:
Use row weight of 1 for all buttons in the number pad grid for each NumberPadTimePicker layout.

This commit allows a NumberPadTimePicker, when used with layout_height="match_parent", to stretch the height of its number keys evenly across the entire height of its parent layout. The keys will still remain their minHeight value when NumberPadTimePicker is used with layout_height="wrap_content".

title: Change window height of BottomSheetNumberPadTimePickerDialog from WRAP_CONTENT…
message:
Change window height of BottomSheetNumberPadTimePickerDialog from WRAP_CONTENT to MATCH_PARENT for eligible layout qualifiers.

This fixes the following issues that occurred for SDK 23+:
 - The bottom edge of the dialog was slightly pushed up from the screen edge.
 - The dialog's enter animation was janky and distorted.

NumberPadTimePicker and NumberPadTimePickerPresenter have been promoted to handle all view logic, while NumberPadTimePickerDialogViewDelegate and NumberPadTimePickerDialogPresenter have been simplified to handle only dialog action buttons.
